title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 851.2 - Additional requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 851.2 - Additional requirements

State Regulations

Any of the signatory parties may impose standards, including water quality criteria and effluent quality requirements, with
respect to waste discharges within its jurisdiction more stringent than those
provided by the comprehensive plan and these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
851.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
